properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
CAMEROON TO GABON.
DNC 01.
M/V LCT EVELIA, 13 PERSONS ON BOARD, SANK IN
BETWEEN DOUALA (04-03-00N 009-41-00E) AND
LIBREVILLE (00-23-24N 009-27-00E). TEN PERSONS
RESCUED, THREE PERSONS REMAIN MISSING.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC BREMEN,
INMARSAT-C: 492621021,
TELEX: 41246466,
PHONE: 494 3253 6870, 494 2153 6870,
FAX: 4942 1536 8714,
E-MAIL: MAIL@MRCC-BREMEN.DE.
